name: dropcult
description:
Welcome to [dropcult] Early Access!

We made Dropcult completely free - Without ads and no interruptions!

Features
- You can vote on all the new features and content that we implement.
- We opened a new interactive medium for music, fashion and pop-culture.
- Expression through fashion is a vital part of our Ecosystem & our Avatar Creator lets you create anyone.
- Fast, chaotic gameplay with an Arsenal of weapons and special abilities.
- Reactive Control System for console quality gameplay.

We put gaming in the center of Entertainment.
